entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Fog patches. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 9:14 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 9:14 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 9:14 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
